text: John Leonard Morris (October 18, 1926 â€“ January 25, 2018) was an American movie, television and broadway composer, dance arranger, conductor, and trained concert pianist. He was known for composing the movie scores for Blazing Saddles, Young Frankenstein, The Elephant Man (for which he was nominated for a Grammy for its score) and Dirty Dancing. Morris died at his home in Red Hook, New York on January 25, 2018, of a respiratory tract infection at the age of 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * *John Morris on Myspace Category:1926 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection Category:American composers Category:American pianists Category:American conductors Category:Writers from New Jersey
title: John Morris (composer)
